nodes.text: Feeorins were a sentient species with thick tendrils hanging from the back of their heads. During the early years of the Galactic Empire's reign, a Feeorin named Warjak performed as a gladiator, holding the title of champion of the Outer Rim Carve-up. Zira was a female pirate who was also a member of this species.

The Feeorins made their first canonical appearance in Ezra's Gamble, a Star Wars Rebels junior novel by Ryder Windham that was released on August 5, 2014. They originated in Star Wars: Starfighter, a Legends flight simulation video game that was released on February 19, 2001.
